name: Magic Alchemist
description:
A magical game!

On your journey to become the most famous and glorious alchemist you have to merge objects until you discover the final and most mysterious object!

Magic Alchemist is an easy to learn game but nonetheless challenging.

This version is free of advertising. The ad-supported version is called "Magic Alchemist Classic Edition"

* addictive gameplay
* intuitive touchscreen controls
* beautiful graphics
* wicked music
* magical sound effects
* local highscores for your device
* global highscores and country highscores that are shared between all versions of Magic Alchemist
* leave the game anytime and continue your session later
